paper_keywords: minimal pairs of compact convex sets
paper_abstract: In this paper, we determine the cardinality of various subsets of the family of all minimal pairs of compact convex subsets of n (Theorems 2.1 and 2.8). Furthermore, we express minimality properties of a pair of closed bounded convex sets in set-theoretical terms (Theorem 3.3).
paper_title: On the amount of minimal pairs of convex sets
